node.title: You Are What You Eat
node.description: In the physical world our sermon title is literally quite true: the various proteins and nutrients we consume today become the cells, the living body that we will have tomorrow.  But the same is also true spiritually. Jesus’ teaching in John 6 may have been a “hard saying” to those who heard, but it’s an important one nonetheless: If we want more of Jesus in our lives we need to dwell more upon Him, the Living Word.
